creditline: Gift of Mrs. George P. Douglas
markings:
Watermark: upper edge of paper: <((M)ason Freres Vialon=Les-)>;  also in ink in Pennell\'s hand [Tail Piece from Michangelo\'s Faun]; collector\'s \"D\" stamp printed on verso;
Right half of 46.14.271; recto: u.r. corner, inverted, in pencil: [Mr. D says]; l.r., there is residue of chinese white (paint out) which has turned gray. verso: upper edge, in black crayon: [Not used] below this, in pencil: [it was drawn reversed and we cannot use it. Dictated by Mr. Drake] u.r. corner (upside down) \'D\'; Douglas collector\'s mark.
medium: Pen and black ink over graphite on board
signed: LL corner of design: [Jo Pennell, 1883, Fierenze]
title: Tail Piece from Michaelangelo's Faun
